I/we request that you issue on our behalf and for our account your irrevocable Documentary Credit in accordance with the instructions stated and marked herein, a long with the additional conditions, if required, stated overleaf. This credit will be subject to Uniform Customs and Practice for Documentary Credits (2007 Revision, Publication no. 600 of the International Chamber of Commerce, Paris, France), and to INCOTERMS 2010, insofar as they are applicable.

1- In case any/all of the following clauses is/are required by us, we the undersigned under our sole and full responsibility undertake to accept documents as presented and despite any discrepancy, and authorize you to debit any of our accounts with you for documents value plus all charges and commissions incurred thereof and hereby release Bank of Jordan PLC from any responsibility and/or obligation concerning the following:

2- We undertake to insure the goods against theft and fire from the expiry date of the relative marine/land/air insurance until the goods are finally cleared. If we fail to ensure the goods as above, you are authorized, without referring to us, and without any obligation or responsibility on your part, to effect the necessary insurance and debit our account with all the expenses incurred.

3- We authorize you to obtain the foreign exchange permit, if necessary, and we shall pay the value of any losses incurred by you because of the failure of the foreign exchange authorities to provide you with the necessary cover in foreign currency. Since we are fully aware that the bank is obliged to keep funds in foreign currencies abroad for the settlement of documentary letters of credit opened in these currencies, we hereby declare to you that we shall bear the consequences that may arise from fluctuation in the rate of the foreign currency in which this credit is opened, up to the amount of this credit.

4- We authorize you to debit our account(s) with you for any charges and/or commissions and/or interests resulting from any transaction under this credit, in accordance with article no. 35 of the UCP 600.

5- The terms and conditions mentioned in this application are in addition to, and not in substitution of the terms, conditions and articles of: -The agreement with Bank of Jordan Plc signed by us embodying the General Conditions for Documentary Credits and/or the General Conditions for the Accepted Guaranteed Drafts/ Guaranteed Bills of Exchange. - The Uniform Customs and Practice for Documentary Credits (2007 Revision Publication No. 600) and/or any revisions thereof. All terms, conditions and articles of which are completely understood by us, we also, confirm that we shall not relieved from any of our obligations under any provision or article.

6- Documents issued either in the currency of the credit or in the official EURO counter value, are acceptable. Payment effected in EURO for the equivalent of the currency of the credit at the conversion rate fixed by the European Union are also acceptable.
7- We have duly noted, understood, and approved contents, terms and conditions, by putting freely our signatures on this application thereunder.
